alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 1:57AM MST until September 01 at 3:30AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 157 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms that produced very heavy rain around Wikiuep and southeast Mohave County have weakened. However, flash flooding will continue. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wikieup, Alamo Lake and Burro Creek Campground. This includes the following roads... Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 95 and 147. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
